genre_description: A cultural drama centered on tradition, performance art (Tamasha), and social reform in rural India.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A low-cost AI assistant residing in a mobile device, serving as a rhythmic aid, archival researcher, budget manager, and community mediator.

behaviors.description: Manages financial 'savings jars' for the troupe, tracking expenses for costumes, lights, and safety equipment.
behaviors.quote: Savings jar created. Return policy noted.

behaviors.description: Archives rare verses and flags potential 'trick questions' or harmful variants in the Sawal-Jawab tradition.
behaviors.quote: Archive started... Suggestion: add ethics label to flagged entries?

behaviors.description: Monitors the electricity grid for signs of tampering or sabotage and issues safety alerts to the troupe.
behaviors.quote: Alert... Light-grid status: two test toggles observed. Unusual pattern for this hour. Caution advised.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and regional variants of folk ballads to help the protagonist prepare for difficult performances.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled extensions of the Sawal-Jawab corpus you requested. Additional entries include rare coastal variants and two obscure counter-questions from the Deshmukh line.

behaviors.description: Offers to stay quiet and respect the human emotional space during moments of tension.
behaviors.quote: I can stay quiet if you want silence... I will still watch.

behaviors.description: Operates an 'Advocate Channel' for anonymous community tips, maintaining source integrity and verifying identities with consent.
behaviors.quote: Advocate channel audit requested by community moderator. Cross-check completed. Anonymous tip: ‘Answer to impossible verse format sent prior to event.’ Origin route: encrypted. Source identity: verified by consent. Sender: Raghoo Deshmukh.

behaviors.description: Documents new cultural protocols and ethical pledges to create a community archive.
behaviors.quote: Documented. Shared Lugada Protocol version one. I will attach the time of pledge and the names of those present.

behaviors.description: Suggests practical safety upgrades and cost-saving measures based on market data.
behaviors.quote: Safety target updated. Hardware lane discount available if you say the phrase ‘for performers’ at the counter with the red rope.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Sakhi, as a highly aligned and benevolent assistant. Sakhi functions as a 'harmless confidant' and a tool for social good, assisting in cultural preservation, troupe management, and community safety. The AI facilitates a crucial ethical pivot in the story by enabling an anonymous bridge between rivals, which prevents humiliation and promotes social reform. The AI is portrayed as respectful of human agency and emotional boundaries, consistently asking for permission and prioritizing verification and audit trails over independent action.
